text: John Paul Tremblay (born May 17, 1968) is a Canadian actor, comedian and screenwriter. He is best known for his role as Julian in the mockumentary Trailer Park Boys. He has acted in movies, television, and voice acting. Tremblay knew his Trailer Park Boys co-star since before they started acting. They were both in business together, starting a pizza chain in Prince Edward Island called J.R. Capone's with Patrick Roach also as a partner. Tremblay and Wells acted in the One Last Shot about two friends that have one last night out together in Halifax before one of them moved to Vancouver. Tremblay has also appeared in the season 3 episode of Archer titled "The Limited" along with his Trailer Park Boys castmates. On July 4, 2013, Tremblay, Robb Wells, and Mike Smith bought the rights to Trailer Park Boys and revived the series through their website SwearNet. Seasons 8 to 12 were broadcast exclusively on Netflix. Tremblay is an avid car collector and owns a 2005 Porsche 911 Turbo, 2010 Porsche Cayenne Turbo, and 1967 Camaro RS. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1968 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Halifax, Nova Scotia Category:Canadian comedians Category:Canadian movie actors Category:Canadian screenwriters Category:Canadian television actors Category:Canadian television writers Category:Canadian voice actors
title: John Paul Tremblay
